generic:link.msg:message: Value assertion not satisfied [Value reported for Overseas Investments should be sum of 1. Equity 2. Debt Instruments 3. Joint Venture and Wholly Owned Subsidiaries 4. Acquisition of qualification shares or shares towards professional services rendered or in lieu of Directors remuneration and 5. IDRs]
Value assertion not satisfied [Value reported for Travel should be sum of 1. Business travel 2. Travel for pilgrimage 3. Private travel 4. Internation debit cards and 5. Emigration]
Value assertion not satisfied [Value reported for Medical treatment should be sum of 1. Remittance for medical treatment 2. Travel for medical treatment]
Value assertion not satisfied [Value reported for Education should be sum of 1. Remittance for studies abroad 2. Travel for education]
Value assertion not satisfied [Value reported for Others should be sum of 1. Loans to NRI close relatives 2. Health insurance]

Value assertion not satisfied [Value reported for Total remittances should be sum of 1. Opening of foreign currency account 2. Purchase of immovable property 3. Overseas investments 4. Gift 5. Donation 6. Travel 7. Remittance for family maintenance 8. Medical treatment 9. Education and 10. Others]

va:valueAssertion.test: not(empty($V1)) and not(empty($V2)) and not(empty($V3)) and not(empty($V4)) and not(empty($V5)) and not(empty($V6)) and not(empty($V7)) and not(empty($V8)) and not(empty($V9)) and not(empty($V10)) and not(empty($V11)) and not(empty($V12)) and not(empty($V13)) and not(empty($V14)) and not(empty($V15)) and not(empty($V16)) and not(empty($V17)) and not(empty($V18)) and not(empty($V19)) and not(empty($V20)) and not(empty($V21)) and not(empty($V22)) and not(empty($V23)) and not(empty($V24)) and not(empty($V25)) and not(empty($V26)) and not(empty($V27))

generic:link.msg:message: All the facts with respect to 'No of applicants' must be reported.
